name: Denver Container Pool Deck Plan – 10x20 Elevated Deck with Railing
open_features: (9) 18×18×12 in reinforced concrete footings with 6×6 posts
Railings: 4×4 posts with 2×4 rails, 2×2 balusters @6 in O.C. (≤4 in spacing)
Hardware: Simpson ABU44Z bases, LUS210 hangers, LPC4Z caps, HUC412 hangers, A34 clips, LSC connectors
Pool integration schematic only; pool safety, bonding/grounding, and anti-entrapment by licensed pool contractors
safety_note: Plans are preliminary; final engineering, pool safety systems, and local permitting must be addressed by licensed professionals.
